titleStmt.title: Popery, superstition, ignorance, and knavery, very unjustly by a letter in the general pretended but as far as was charg'd, very fully proved upon the dissenters that were concerned in the Surey imposture / by Zach. Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Zachary, 1653-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Jones ... and Ephraim Jonston ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
